Title: A Heaven of Hell
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Heather Bellson, M. Willis, David Grimm (story editor), Alyssa Clark (story editor)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Zuleikha Robinson, Kurt Egyiawan
Plot: New details about Mouse's past are revealed as she and Father Bennett head west to rendezvous with Marcus and Tomas.
